title: Blackout: Berlin
imgSmText: A city-wide blackout plunges Berlin into chaos, hiding a dark secret.
imgText: When an unprecedented blackout paralyzes Germany's capital, a cybercrime investigator discovers it wasn't an accident but a targeted attack masking a far more sinister operation.

title: The Taken Flowers
imgSmText: In a remote village, teenage girls are vanishing without a trace.
imgText: A determined teacher in a small Colombian town realizes her students are being systematically abducted by a new narco group, leading her on a dangerous investigation.

title: Crypto Grave
imgSmText: An expat crypto couple is found dead in their El Salvadoran villa.
imgText: A young, wealthy couple cashing in on Bitcoin in El Salvador is brutally murdered. A financial journalist uncovers their ties to a dangerous cartel laundering money through crypto.

title: The Good Son
imgSmText: A perfect British family is shattered by a horrific crime from within.
imgText: In an affluent London suburb, parents are found murdered. All evidence points to their seemingly ideal son, forcing his aunt to confront the terrifying truth about her nephew.

title: The Thames Killer
imgSmText: A dark-humored detective hunts a serial killer in Victorian London.
imgText: In 1888 London, an unorthodox and morbidly witty detective uses unconventional methods to track a killer who is terrorizing the city, taunting the police with cryptic letters.

title: The Mommy Sloths
imgSmText: Five suburban moms investigate their neighbor's suspicious disappearance.
imgText: When a fellow mom vanishes, five friends from the school run uncover a web of lies and corruption in their sleepy English town, putting their own families in grave danger.

title: White Line
imgSmText: A recovering addict's past threatens his new life and family.
imgText: A former drug runner, now clean and with a family, is forced into one last delivery when his old crew kidnaps his daughter, testing his sobriety and will to survive.

title: The Seed
imgSmText: Women are imprisoned by a billionaire to create his perfect legacy.
imgText: A brilliant biotech billionaire, obsessed with his bloodline, kidnaps and impregnates women he deems genetically perfect. One captive plots a dangerous escape for her and the others.

title: Ash and Silence
imgSmText: During a catastrophic wildfire, people in an LA suburb vanish.
imgText: As a mega-fire rages toward Los Angeles, a neighborhood is evacuated. But some residents don't make it out, and a firefighter discovers they didn't just get lost in the smoke.

title: Vanished Skies
imgSmText: A commercial airliner disappears over the ocean, leaving one clue behind.
imgText: Flight 617 vanishes from radar without a mayday. A year later, a lone life jacket washes ashore, launching an investigation that reveals a deliberate and shocking act of sabotage.

title: The Proxy
imgSmText: The digital identity of a man is stolen and used to frame him for murder.
imgText: A tech consultant finds himself locked out of his bank accounts, social media, his own security system as a digital doppelgaenger uses his identity to commit terrible crimes.

title: The Exchange
imgSmText: A diplomat is forced to become an assassin to save his kidnapped family.
imgText: A British diplomat is given an impossible choice: assassinate a foreign official at a summit or his wife and children, hidden somewhere in the city, will be executed.

title: The Deep State
imgSmText: A low-level analyst uncovers a conspiracy within her own government agency.
imgText: A CIA data analyst stumbles upon a clandestine program that manipulates global events. Now a target, she must expose the truth while trusting no one, not even her colleagues.

title: The Forgotten
imgSmText: A amnesiac wake up on a ship, accused of a murder he can't remember.
imgText: A man regains consciousness on a luxury cruise liner with no memory of who he is or how he got there. He is the prime suspect in a passenger's murder and must find the real killer.

title: The Silent Parish
imgSmText: A new priest discovers his small town church hides a murderous cult.
imgText: A young priest assigned to a remote parish slowly uncovers that the town's devout community is hiding a deadly secret and that the confessional is being used to plan crimes.

title: The Silent Patient
imgSmText: A woman's husband vanishes, but she claims she can't remember why.
imgText: After her husband disappears without a trace, a woman is found in a state of shock, unable to speak. A therapist must unravel her silence to find the terrifying truth.

title: Dead Drop
imgSmText: A courier discovers the package he's carrying is a live bomb.
imgText: An ordinary bike courier accepts a high-paying delivery, only to realize he's been tricked into transporting an explosive device set to detonate at a specific location.

title: The Perfect Tenant
imgSmText: A landlord discovers her tenant is not who he claims to be.
imgText: A homeowner becomes suspicious of her ideal, quiet renter. Her investigation leads her down a dark path of stolen identities and a history that connects to an unsolved crime.

title: Echo Location
imgSmText: A blind man uses his heightened senses to track a killer in his building.
imgText: After hearing a struggle in a neighboring apartment, a blind man is the only witness. He must use his exceptional hearing and memory to identify the killer before they silence him.

title: One Last Call
imgSmText: A 911 operator receives a call from a number that belongs to her daughter.
imgText: A seasoned emergency dispatcher takes a frantic call from a girl trapped in a car trunk. The call's origin is her own daughter's phone, but her daughter is safe at home.
